thread.title: Access One Inc. Renews Agreement for Service With IDI Billing Solutions
thread.title_full: Access One Inc. Renews Agreement for Service With IDI Billing Solutions

author: admin
title: Access One Inc. Renews Agreement for Service With IDI Billing Solutions
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: IDI Billing Solutions 
VICTOR, N.Y. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- IDI Billing Solutions , a global provider of cloud-based Billing and Order Management solutions for Communication Service Providers, is pleased to announce that Access One has renewed its contract for services. IDI first earned Access One’s business in 2005 and has remained their preferred billing vendor for over 10 years. Access One will be upgrading to the latest release of CostGuard ® , gaining access to a myriad of new features and applications that will allow them to streamline their order-to-cash processes. 
Known for both unparalleled customer service and a cutting-edge network, Access One provides growing businesses with complete end-to-end communications solutions for traditional and multimedia applications. Access One offers high-speed data and Internet, voice and integrated communications, colocation at secure data centers, managed IT support, Hosted PBX services and more. Access One tailors each solution to meet a specific business need. Though based in Chicago, Access One can support their customers’ voice and data needs throughout the United States. 
“With IDI Billing Solutions, we know we have a partner dedicated to meeting our needs. The company’s investment in research and development and commitment to delivering innovative solutions separates them from other vendors,” said John Hoehne, Chief Operating Officer of Access One. “IDI has been our billing partner since 2005. In the ten plus years our organizations have worked together, we have built a successful relationship that we are excited to extend.” 
Donald Culeton, President and CEO of IDI Billing Solutions said, “Competition in the communications market is intense. To stay ahead, service providers need to remain agile and ready for the future. We are confident that our strategy of collaborating with customers to design our products and keeping them on the latest software will give them the tools they need to successfully compete and win in the market.” 
About Access One 
Access One is a privately-held business technology and communications services provider located in Chicago. Unlike many of the telecom and cable giants that prioritize the bottom line above all else, their mission is to provide the number one customer experience in the marketplace. Since 1993, they have continually strived to fulfill this mission and are proud to maintain an A+ rating from the Better Business Bureau. Access One’s product portfolio includes high-speed data and Internet, voice and integrated communications, colocation at secure data centers, managed IT support, Hosted PBX services and more. 
About IDI Billing Solutions 
IDI Billing Solutions is a leading Billing and OSS services provider for the communications industry. IDI’s Billing as a Service SM includes the award-winning CostGuard® application, expert back-office and professional services, and a highly secure SaaS-hosted platform. IDI’s Billing as a Service gives communication providers the tools to quickly monetize their services and automate operations related to selling, activating, and billing customers. IDI maintains multiple Gold Competencies in the Microsoft Partner Program. To learn more about IDI, please visit us at www.idibilling.com or call 1.888.924.4110.
